name: The Gecko King - Alpha
description:
Hi there,

Please test our game and give us feedback… 

Controls are:

  • Horizontal Swipes to move the player (Only if the lines are connected)
  • Touch each tile to rotate it.

I’m testing:

  • Level layouts
  • Level difficulty
  • Controls and Feel of the game.

It’s a alpha build. It still has a long way to go. Cheers :D

You can leave your comments in the comments section.
